v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the order payment in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (NOT RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (NOT RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderInProcess, CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ForShipment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS ForPayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.BankAccount, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.WorkKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.PriceKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShipmentDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed, DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.PettyCash, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentCustomerOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentCustomerOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentCustomerOrder.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentCustomerOrder.Company, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.Project, DocumentCustomerOrder.Event, DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState, DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus AS OrderStateState, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.SalesStructuralUnit, DocumentCustomerOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.CashAssetsType, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, DocumentCustomerOrder.PointInTime, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0)) * 100 / DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS PaymentAmountTurnover FROM Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.Order AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.Order AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentFact AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment
